snippet.title: Gunspell 1 Trailer - English (hand)
snippet.description:
It is a story-driven rpg-adventure where guns and magic act together! 
Become a member of this powerful Order whose mission it is to protect Earth. Travel through other worlds, contend with monsters, upgrade your weapons and enhance your magic. Have fun!
It is a completely free game with an option to purchase packs of in-game currency or a premium account.
 
• Match 3 battles with a lot of features
• Multiple strange new worlds to explore
• Hordes of enemies to fight
• Tons of different weapons, items, and spells!
• Awesome graphics!

Game Awards
★ DevGAMM Award 
★ MS Windows Store Stuff Pick
★ Repeatedly featured by Google

Follow us:
https://www.facebook.com/gunspell
https://twitter.com/inocoplus
http://youtube.com/InoCoPlus
